ygData.subject: Re: Bard petition ideas (Long)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... the ... if ... Oh, I made the comment bout the pushing button and copper thing.  :)  I am not a fan of rogues in any true RPG, but in a few of the CRPGs I
ygData.messageBody:
>The original idea was a Bard Performance skill, the argument degraded to
the
>statement "I would not like a skill where all that was done, was pushing a
>button for a few copper or something of the sort, I was just stating that
if
>that was the case then the person in question who made that statement would
>not like a rogue, who's pickpocket skills are much like that....


Oh, I made the comment bout the pushing button and copper thing. :) I am
not a fan of rogues in any true RPG, but in a few of the CRPGs I have
thought they were fun. In EQ they are really worthless. :( It is a shame
that Verrant has really screwed all rogue players.
-Sprite
